arts.ttl: Max Clark on the spot to earn point for Gillingham against Colchester
arts.sum: Gareth Ainsworth guides Gills to a draw in first home game in charge.

arts.ttl: Gillingham 1 Colchester United 1 - match report as depleted U's claim away point
arts.sum: MATCH STATS: Colchester United: Macey, Egbo, Flanagan, Tucker, Kelleher, Iandolo, Read, Edwards (sub Scully, 25; sub Aboh, 87)), Payne (sub Hunt, 39), Thorn (sub Jolliffe, 87), Simpson. It had looked like the U's would claim victory at Priestfield Stadium after Jack Payne had given them a 20th-minute lead but Max Clark's late penalty denied them victory.

arts.ttl: 'It's still in our hands': Tom Flanagan on Colchester United's play-off push
arts.sum: “They’re one of the best teams we’ve played here and that’s credit to them but I think it’s credit to us as well. “It’s still in our hands because of the fixtures we’ve got and as long as it’s in our hands, we’ll do what we can.

Gillingham's 1-1 draw with Harrogate at the weekend was their third successive draw, they have now lost just once in their last six games. Colchester's play off ambitions have taken a dip recently fo...
